attributes.action: Call an immediate National Referendum on An Immediate General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the united kingdom have had enough of Labour in power. 

We are a democracy so let democracy happen and give the the UK a referendum for a general election. 

Let the People speak.
attributes.background: Give the UK a National Referendum on an immediate general election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce a mid-term referendum on whether to hold an early General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734396
